1.0.name: wordpress/origami-paper
1.0.description: Origami Paper is an Origami child theme. It takes Origami, which is a clean simple theme, and transforms it into a richly detailed theme with a warm wooden background and a host of small details to give your site a high quality feel. Just like Origami, this theme integrates nicely with our Page Builder. This means you can use Origami Paper for antyhing from a simple landing page to a fully functional business theme.
